workflow.name: Nightly n8n backup to Google Drive
workflow.description:
## Description
This template creates a nightly backup of all n8n workflows and saves them to a Google Drive folder. Each night, the previous night's backups are moved to an ‚Äún8n_old‚Äù folder and renamed with the corresponding date.

Backups older than a specified age are automatically deleted (this feature is active for 30 days, you can remove it if you don't want the backups to be deleted).

## Prerequisites

- Google Drive account and credentials **Get** from the following link. [Link](https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials/oauthclient/)
- n8n version from v 1.63.4 to 1.70.1 or higher
- N8n api key **Guide** from the following link. [Link](https://witmovil.com/where-to-create-the-api-key-in-n8n/)
- A destination folder for backups:
‚Äún8n_old‚Äù
‚Äún8n_backups‚Äù
(if it doesn't exist, create it)

## Configuration
1. Update all Google Drive nodes with your credentials.
2. Edit the Schedule Trigger node with the desired time to run the backup.

If you want to automatically purge old backups.
1. Edit the ‚ÄúPURGE DAYS‚Äù node to specify the age of the backups you want to delete.
2. Enable the ‚ÄúPURGE DAYS‚Äù node and the 3 subsequent nodes.
3. Enable the workflow to run on the specified schedule.

## Last updated
January 2025

parameters.content: MOVE CURRENT BACKUPS TO OLD FOLDER

## Ignore any other folders other than: n8n_backups














    (it is important that you created this folder)

## Since the folder does not exist, it creates a new one.
n8n_backups
n8n_old
## Does a folder exist?, if it does not exist it creates it

## Description
This template creates a nightly backup of all n8n workflows and saves them to a GitHub folder. Each night, the previous night's backups are moved to an ‚Äún8n_old‚Äù folder and renamed with the corresponding date.

Backups older than a specified age are automatically deleted (this feature is active for 30 days, you can remove it if you don't want the backups to be deleted).

## Prerequisites

- Google Drive account and credentials **Get** from the following link. [Link](https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials/oauthclient/)
- n8n version 1.67.1 or higher
- N8n api key **Guide** from the following link. [Link](https://witmovil.com/where-to-create-the-api-key-in-n8n/)
- A destination folder for backups:
‚Äún8n_old‚Äù
‚Äún8n_backups‚Äù
(if it doesn't exist, create it)

## Configuration
Update all Google Drive nodes with your credentials.
Edit the Schedule Trigger node with the desired time to run the backup.
If you want to automatically purge old backups.

Edit the ‚ÄúPURGE DAYS‚Äù node to specify the age of the backups you want to delete.
Enable the ‚ÄúPURGE DAYS‚Äù node and the 3 subsequent nodes.
Enable the workflow to run on the specified schedule.

## Bug fixes v3:
* Fixed move section now detects more than 13 files and moves them to n8n_old folder
* Changed file filtering
* In the next version "Split In Batches" will be changed to "Loop Over Items"

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

The Filter node can be used to filter items based on a condition. If the condition is met, the item will be passed on to the next node. If the condition is not met, the item will be omitted. Conditions can be combined together by AND(meet all conditions), or OR(meet at least one condition).
